communities.name: Bellevue
communities.headline: Now Selling in West Greenville!
communities.description: Eastwood Homes is proud to announce Bellevue, an intimate new community in West Greenville with convenience and recreation opportunities right around the corner. Bellevue is ideally located only two miles from shopping, dining, and hiking on Swamp Rabbit Trail, Greenville Tech's Northwest Campus, Saluda Lake Landing, and Saluda River Adventures. Plus, residents are a quick four-mile drive to enjoy charming downtown Greenville including Greenville Zoo, Falls Park on the Reedy, eclectic dining, baseball games, and so much more.Home designs at Bellevue will include popular single-family plans with sought-after features including first-floor primary bedrooms, lofts, well-appointed kitchens with islands, and spa-like baths. Plus, Bellevue will also offer brand-new townhome designs!Schedule your visit today!

communities.name: Attenborough Townhomes
communities.from_the: Townhomes from the mid to high $200s
communities.headline: Luxury low-maintenance townhomes for sale
communities.description: Attenborough Townhomes in Piedmont, SC, features a collection of luxury townhomes with one-car attached garages, two and three bedrooms, beautifully appointed kitchens, large primary suites, and thoughtfully designed gathering areas with low-maintenance exteriors.  Attenborough Townhomes offers an outstanding location less than one mile from I-85, restaurants, and shopping, and approximately five miles to Greenville Memorial Hospital and just a short drive past that, iconic downtown Greenville. Schedule your visit today!

communities.name: Fairview Village Townhomes
communities.from_the: Townhomes from the mid to high $200s
communities.headline: Now selling - conveniently located townhomes
communities.description: Fairview Village Townhomes features a prime location!  Located only miles from the charming downtown area, Fairview Village is less than one mile from I-385 South. Plus, residents will have access to numerous major retailers, restaurants, and other conveniences. less than two miles in either direction. Featuring some of Eastwood's most popular townhome designs, Fairview Village offers the ultimate in location, convenience, and carefree living.Schedule your visit today!

communities.name: Greenrich Mill
communities.headline: Now Selling - Homes For Sale in Simpsonville, SC
communities.description: Eastwood Homes is proud to announce Greenrich Mill, a community featuring two collections of new homes in Simpsonville. Residents will enjoy an ideal location, only three miles to I-185, and less than four miles to I-385, making commutes and travel to Greenville a breeze. Homes will include gorgeous kitchens, spa-like baths, and thoughtfully designed interiors, plus select homes will feature alley garages.Schedule your visit today!

communities.name: Harrington
communities.headline: New Homes in Harrington in Greenville, SC
communities.description: Welcome to Harrington in Greenville, SC. Located a short drive to I-185 and several of the area's top employers including 3M Corporation, Greenville International Airport, and Michelin, residents of Harrington will experience the benefits of homeownership in an outstanding location. Home designs include ranch-style and two-story homes with personalization options including bonus rooms, additional bedrooms, sunrooms, and screen porches. And residents will enjoy outstanding amenities including two swimming pools, a playground, outdoor gathering areas, and a covered pavilion with a stone fireplace.  Schedule your visit today!

communities.name: Highland Park
communities.headline: Two-Story & Ranch-Style Homes For Sale Near Spartanburg, SC
communities.description: Eastwood Homes is proud to announce Highland Park, just outside of Spartanburg, SC in nearby Roebuck, SC. This convenient community is less than five miles from I-26 and numerous Spartanburg, SC area shopping and dining establishments. Highland Park offers popular home designs including ranch-style and two-story homes, spa-like baths, and stylish kitchens.Schedule your visit today!

communities.name: Riverbrooke Townhomes
communities.headline: Gorgeous New Townhomes For Sale
communities.description: Eastwood Homes is proud to present Riverbrooke Townhomes, a new townhome community in Simpsonville, SC. Located in Greenville County, the townhomes at Riverbrooke offer first-floor primary suites, soaring two-story ceilings, well-appointed kitchens, and luxurious baths with one-car attached garages. Residents will enjoy an outstanding location less than three miles from I-385 and I-185, restaurants, shopping, and other conveniences, and a quick commute to Greenville's zoo, parks, downtown area, and the airport.Schedule your visit today!

division.name: Greenville
division.subheadline: Welcome to the Upstate of South Carolina!
division.intro: Located off I-85 in the northwest area of South Carolina, new construction homes in Greenville offer a quick drive to Georgia, North Carolina, and Tennessee.
division.description: Greenville, South Carolina is a bustling city on the banks of the Reedy River with a rich manufacturing history and an eye to the future. Home to over 650+ manufacturing companies, there are 150 company headquarters and 40 Fortune 500 companies. Over 250 international firms from 26 different countries including Michelin North American Headquarters and BMW call Greenville home. The rolling hills and the Blue Ridge Mountains in the distance offer a picturesque landscape and along with downtown Greenville's and culinary and cultural attractions, it's easy to see why residents are drawn to this lively city.

highlights.name: BMW
highlights.description: Located halfway between Greenville and Spartanburg, BMW & MINI offers one of only two Performance Driving Schools in the country. Test your skills on the Performace Track, the Straightaway, the Slalom, and the Wet Ski Pad, to see if you've got what it takes behind the wheel!

highlights.name: Greenville Drive Baseball/Fluor Field
highlights.description: Fluor Field, located in the West End of the Greenville downtown district is the home to Greenville Drive baseball. A Class A affiliate of the Boston Red Sox, this minor league team offers major league fun for the residents of Greenville!

highlights.name: Outdoor Fun: Falls Park Downtown/ Swamp Rabbit Trail
highlights.description: Falls Park on the Reedy is Greenville's true gem and an oasis for residents. Located along the banks of the Reedy River, the park is the centerpiece of the revitalized Main Street area and offers a meandering footbridge encouraging exploration of waterfalls and beautiful scenery and the shops, eateries, and other details of the downtown Greenville.
